cells.data:
minishift start --cpus 2 --memory=8192 --iso-url https://github.com/minishift/minishift-centos-iso/releases/download/v1.0.0/minishift-centos7.iso
# cinishift start --cpus 2 --memory=8192 => cdk!

oc login -u system:admin
oc project default
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin developer
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin admin

# Gogs default creds are either gogsadmin/admin123 or gogsadmin/RedHat$1 (fabric8)
